videos.title: GIVĒON - TWENTIES (2025)
videos.additional_info:
GIVĒON - TWENTIES (2025)
A cinematic reflection on youth, ambition, and the bittersweet passage of time. Directed by Loris Russier, with stunning cinematography by Edouard Le Grelle and rich, moody color grading by Jacob McKee, the video immerses viewers in a visually striking journey through late-night cityscapes, fleeting romance, and moments of introspection. Blending elegance with raw emotion, "Twenties" captures the highs and lows of coming of age, wrapped in GIVĒON’s signature soulful sound. Director - @lorisrussier Production Company - @lotumn_ Executive Producer / Producer - @autumnmaschi Executive Producer - @lorisrussier Director Of Photography - @edlegrelle Creative Director: @riko_akme Giveon Stylist - @yashuasimmons Management - @eeekksss, Simon Gebrelul Epic Head of Video Production - @gstarsz Starring - @ayomideadeduro
Technique - Projections , Video Portraits , Void
Director - Loris Russier
DOP - Edouard Le Grelle
Editor - Jacob McKee

videos.title: Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "Say Nothing" by Flume featuring MAY-A, directed by Michael Hili, offers a visually captivating and surreal experience. It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.
videos.additional_info:
Flume feat. MAY-A - Say Nothing (2022)
The music video for "Say Nothing" by Flume featuring MAY-A, directed by Michael Hili, offers a visually captivating and surreal experience. It includes psychedelic visuals, with Flume donning a bleach-blonde hairstyle and posing on motorcycles, while MAY-A is seen submerged in black sand. The video uses stark contrasts and vibrant colors to complement the song's themes of post-relationship clarity and emotional expression. This trippy and avant-garde style enhances the song's narrative, making it a standout piece in Flume's discography.
Technique - Projections , Void
Director - Michael Hili
DOP - Dimitri Zaunders, Kieran Fowler
Editor - Ian Wallace
Colorist - Josh Bohoskey
Original Source - Link

videos.title: Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
videos.additional_info:
Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
Technique - Bolt Cam , Choreo , Projections
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Vinnie Hobbs
Colorist - Dante Pasquinelli

videos.title: Jurassic Park (1993)
videos.description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
